item.title: 5 EF Core Features You Need To Know
item.description: EF Core is powerful, and knowing a few key features can save you lots of time and frustration. I've cherry-picked five essential features that you really need to know. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/5-ef-core-features-you-need-to-know
